description: Mentioned only by Irwin, who says: �Major Clarinet and Minor Clarinet have somewhat different meanings [from Solo Clarinet], not always implying the solo tonality.� This stop would only appear in an organ which contained another Clarinet of more prominent tone. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Solo 'Cello FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only.
